questions.title: StudyID
questions.description: ID assigned to original registration on RIDIE site

questions.title: Intervention Completion Date
questions.description: When was the intervention or program completed? If this is an ongoing program, leave the date blank.

questions.title: Data Collection Completion Date
questions.description: When was data collection on outcomes completed?

questions.title: Unit of Analysis
questions.description: What was the main unit of analysis for the evaluation?

questions.title: Clusters in Final Sample
questions.description: If the intervention involved clusters or groups as the unit of randomization or program assignment, please indicate the final number of clusters or groups in the sample used in the analysis. Be sure to indicate the units, e.g. 200 Schools

questions.title: Total Observations in Final Sample
questions.description: For estimating primary program impacts, what was the total number of individual observations used in the analysis (including program recipients and controls or comparisons)? Be sure to indicate the units, e.g. 10,000 pupils.

questions.nav: Size of Treatment, Control, or Comparison Subsamples
questions.title: Size of Treatment, Control, or Comparison Subsamples
questions.description: What is the size of each treatment and control or comparison subsample in the main analysis? (If the analysis is at the cluster or group level, please give the number of groups, not individuals, in each subsample.) e.g. 50 schools control, 50 schools teacher training, 50 schools scholarship 50 schools both treatment

questions.title: Preliminary Report
questions.description: Is there a report on the results?

questions.title: Preliminary Report URL
questions.description: Provide a link to the report if available.

questions.title: Summary of Findings
questions.description: Summarize your results. (Copy and paste a report abstract or executive summary as appropriate. Highlight the results for the key outcomes and hypotheses you outlined when registering.)

questions.title: Paper
questions.description: Are there any published studies based on this evaluation?

questions.title: Paper Summary
questions.description: Provide titles and brief summaries of the studies.

questions.title: Paper Citation
questions.description: Enter the citations.

questions.title: Data Availability (Primary Data)
questions.description: Is the data set you used available for other researchers (whether access is free or restricted), or will it be in the future?
options: No--Data not expected to be available

questions.title: Date of Data Availability
questions.description: When will the data be available?

questions.title: Data URL or Contact
questions.description: Enter a link to the data set, if available, or the name and email of a contact person for access.

questions.title: Access procedure
questions.description: If the data are or will be available only on a restricted basis, please describe the procedure to apply for the data.

questions.title: Survey
questions.description: Can you share the survey questionnaire(s) you used (if not previously made publicly available)?

questions.title: Survey Instrument Links or Contact
questions.description: Provide the link to the survey instrument(s) or describe how to obtain them.

questions.title: Program Files
questions.description: Are program files (e.g., Stata .do files) available for public distribution?

questions.title: Program Files Links or Contact
questions.description: If yes, please provide a link to the files or the name and email of a contact person for access.

questions.title: External Link
questions.description: Please provide links to any other related websites, documents, etc.

questions.title: External Link Description
questions.description: Describe the above links.

questions.title: Description of Changes
questions.description: Please add any comments you would like to make on changes in this project between the initial registration and the reporting of the results (e.g., changes in evaluation method, sample size, hypotheses, etc.).

questions.title: Date
questions.description: When was the study stopped?

questions.title: Reason
questions.description: Why was the study stopped?
